backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming the engagement rate display value was updated to 5.2% in siteContent.ts, with high confidence and linked to test REQ-1.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document summarizing each frontend source file's purpose and key changes, serving as a build/documentation reference for the project.
frontend/.env.production.example: Example production environment file defining VITE_PUBLIC_URL for use in Open Graph metadata, Twitter Cards, canonical links, and share URLs.
frontend/index.css: Root CSS file defining OKLCH-based design tokens for light and dark themes including colors, borders, charts, and sidebar variables via Tailwind base layer.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO metadata, Open Graph and Twitter Card tags, canonical URL, and Inter font preconnect all configured for the bubbas.big.adventure.com domain.
frontend/PUBLIC_URL.md: Documentation explaining that the canonical public URL (https://bubbas.big.adventure.com) is defined as a single source of truth in publicUrl.ts.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the appropriate section based on the active URL hash tab and wraps content in a view mode class for responsive preview constraints.
frontend/src/components/site/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying brand name, Instagram and Facebook social links, copyright, and a Caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/site/portfolio/D: Inline iframe component for embedding Google Drive videos with loading, error, and hover-triggered expand-button states.
frontend/src/components/site/portfolio/P: Card component that renders a 9:16 video embed via DriveVideoEmbed and opens a full-screen PortfolioVideoOverlay when the expand button is clicked.
A fullscreen video overlay modal component that embeds a video via iframe, locks body scroll, closes on Escape key or backdrop click, and optionally displays a description.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Ab: Renders the About section with a profile photo, bio paragraphs, and a grid of past brand collaborations sourced from siteContent.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Co: Renders the Contact section displaying email, Instagram, and location info with mailto and external links, sourced from siteContent.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/He: Full-screen hero section with headline, subhead, and two CTA buttons that navigate to the media-kit and contact tabs using a custom hook.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Me: Displays a structured media kit with quick stats, audience demographics, platforms, services summary, and noteworthy projects sourced from siteContent.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Po: Renders the Portfolio section by iterating over content categories and displaying each item using PortfolioItemCard in a responsive grid.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Pr: Displays influencer and UGC pricing packages with line items, add-ons, notes, and a custom footer note, all sourced from siteContent.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Se: A reusable section wrapper component that renders a titled, subtitled section with consistent padding, a separator, and a container for child content.
frontend/src/components/site/SiteNav.tsx: Fixed navigation bar with desktop and mobile (Sheet) layouts, tab-based routing, scroll-aware styling, and an embedded ViewModeControl; Portfolio is the last nav item.
frontend/src/components/site/ViewModeCon: Dropdown select component allowing users to switch between Auto, Mobile, and Desktop view modes, each represented with an icon and label.
frontend/src/config/publicUrl.ts: Exports the canonical public URL for the app, defaulting to the production domain and allowing override via the VITE_PUBLIC_URL environment variable.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Central content configuration object containing all static text, stats, portfolio items, pricing, and contact info used across the site's sections.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing ICP Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useTabNavigation.ts: Hook that manages tab navigation state using the URL hash, supporting a fixed set of allowed tab IDs and syncing state with hash changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useViewMode.ts: Hook that persists and applies a view mode ('auto', 'mobile', or 'desktop') to localStorage and the document root's data attribute.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file defining Tailwind base/components/utilities, OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for a sage-green/tan design system with light and dark themes, and view mode layout constraints.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/googleDrive.ts: Utility functions for extracting Google Drive file IDs from various URL formats and generating preview, direct, and embed URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with OKLCH color tokens (sage, tan, chart colors), custom border radii, box shadows, accordion animations, and typography/container-queries/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata file tracking schema version, existing features, and the current task of updating the media kit engagement rate display value to 5.2%.
